description:
#### Three ways to turn off Xbox 360 controllers

Double click the tray icon
Use tray icon context menu
Create shortcut to the app with a /silent parameter and double click it as in previous app versions  

#### Package Parameters:

 - `/NoDesktopShortcut` Do not create Desktop Shortcut
 - `/NoStartMenuShortcut` Do not create Start Menu Shortcut
 - `/NoAutoStart` Do not start the apllication with Windows

#### Package updates
   
New versions of this package are published automatically via the `update.ps1` script (viewable in the package source on GitHub).
summary: Turn Off your Wireless Xbox 360 Controller on PC
